Summary: observed white glowing round object flying directly above house
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around July 9th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsObserved white glowing sphere fly below clouds direct flight towards northwest. Had fuzzy aura looked similar to paint brush marks coming from one side of the sphere. Moved slowly and direct path. I first thought it was a falling star but much to big and no tail. I saw a smaller red orb flying a few months ago. The red sphere flew much faster and was much smaller. It also flew in the exact opposite direction of the new white sphere. Lost sight as it went over the hill. I would really love to know what they are. We are going to attempt setting a camera on the roof.
